notes: Successfully proven all transition matrix and distribution properties. 23 lemmas across two slop files: transition matrix properties (11 lemmas) and probability distributions (12 lemmas). Key results: entries in [0,1], symmetry for undirected graphs, row sums = 1 for d-regular graphs, uniform distribution validity. Fixed transitionMatrix_row_sum with degree characterization proof.
next_steps: Foundation for random walk analysis on graphs
